title: Medieval & Magic (COMPLETE OST)
description: Be absorbed into a world of Medieval Epic & Magic RPG Type OST! Explore uncharted lands, take rest inside inns and get ready to fight epic battles! Specially made for Video game experiences and Epic Medieval environments.
longDescription:
Medieval Epic & Magic RPG complete OST album; 20 minutes of magic music. Explore uncharted lands, take a rest inside inns, and get ready to fight epic battles ⚔️! Specially made for Video game experiences 🎮 and Epic Medieval environments.


Produced by GDM Music

Demos available on:


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=taYF7dwgCwA&ab_channel=GDMMusic

https://soundcloud.com/gdmmusica/sets/medieval-epic-magic-rpg-game-type-ost
technicalDetails:
